item.title: 如果您观看了 Lifetime 周末首播的温迪-威廉姆斯（Wendy Williams）专题片并感到不安，那么您并不孤单。纪录片制作人说，他们在拍摄时并不知道威廉姆斯患有痴呆症，而公众上周才知道。
item.description:
If you watched Lifetime's Wendy Williams docuseries that premiered over the weekend and felt uneasy, you weren't alone.

Documentary producers say they weren't aware at the time of filming that Williams had dementia, which the public learned last week. https://t.co/J19kn8I1GC

— ABC News (@ABC) February 27, 2024

item.title: 美国陆军正在削减约 24000 人的兵力，减幅接近 5%。
item.description:
The U.S. Army is slashing the size of its force by about 24,000, or almost 5%. https://t.co/flZ7GhYR40

item.title: 火星生活：美国国家航空航天局（NASA）火星模拟器中的志愿者将如何生活一年。

item.title: 梅西百货公司（Macy's）周二表示，该公司将在未来三年内关闭 150 家效益不佳的门店，其中包括在 2024 年底前关闭 50 家门店。梅西百货是在公布第四季度亏损和销售额下降后关闭门店的。
item.description:
Macy's will close 150 unproductive stores over the next three years, including 50 by the end of 2024, the department store operator said Tuesday.

The closures come after the company posted a fourth-quarter loss and declining sales. https://t.co/qWpve4nXGD pic.twitter.com/oWlKwaAWpd

— ABC News (@ABC) February 27, 2024

item.title: 拜登政府周二宣布，联邦政府将资助全美 17 个项目，以扩大美国原住民保留地和其他农村地区的可再生能源使用范围。
item.description:
The federal government will fund 17 projects across the U.S. to expand access to renewable energy on Native American reservations and in other rural areas, the Biden administration announced Tuesday. https://t.co/Bq98npJYiE

— ABC News (@ABC) February 27, 2024

item.description:
A judge has ruled that Fulton County prosecutor Nathan Wade's attorney, Terrence Bradley, must retake the stand in former Pres. Trump's Georgia election interference case to testify on topics not covered by attorney-client privilege, sources say. https://t.co/yW25kbt5yW pic.twitter.com/wwrleKsV4N

item.title: 一家 18 世纪英国酒馆在去年一场神秘火灾后被推平，其业主周二接到当地议会的命令，要求重建这家酒馆--而且必须保持原有的倾斜尺寸。
item.description:
The owners of an 18th century British pub, bulldozed after a mysterious fire last year, were ordered Tuesday by a local council to rebuild it — and to stick to its original, lopsided dimensions. https://t.co/TWvNut313P

— ABC News (@ABC) February 27, 2024

item.title: 一位以色列高级政治消息人士告诉 @ABC 新闻，以色列总理本雅明-内塔尼亚胡对拜登总统的讲话感到 "惊讶"，拜登总统说他希望以色列和哈马斯之间的停火协议 "在下周一之前 "能够达成。
item.description:
Israeli P.M. Benjamin Netanyahu was "surprised" by Pres. Biden's remarks that he was hopeful a cease-fire between Israel and Hamas could be in place "by next Monday," a senior Israeli political source told @ABC News. https://t.co/JbA99cFO7T

item.title: 泰国检察官表示，他们将起诉一名前国家警察局长，罪名是阻碍对红牛能量饮料财富继承人采取法律行动，该继承人被指控在2012年的一起肇事逃逸案中杀害了一名曼谷警察。
item.description:
Prosecutors in Thailand say they will indict a former national police chief on charges of impeding legal action against an heir to the Red Bull energy drink fortune who was accused of killing a Bangkok police officer in a 2012 hit-and-run. https://t.co/npXKQKHguX

item.title: 温迪公司（Wendy's）宣布将推出新的菜单价格，该价格将根据一天中的不同时段而浮动--类似于优步（Uber）和Lyft等共享出行公司采用的激增定价策略。
item.description:

item.title: 手机对当今美国青少年的影响有目共睹。现在，越来越多的州和联邦领导人开始支持学校禁止使用手机，并提出了限制使用手机的新方法。
item.description:
The hold that phones have on adolescents in America today is well-documented. Now a growing number of leaders at the state and federal levels have begun endorsing school cellphone bans and suggesting new ways to curb access to the devices. https://t.co/18JW2wBqE8 pic.twitter.com/3MfURrYNia

— ABC News (@ABC) February 27, 2024

item.title: 温迪公司（Wendy's）宣布将推出新的菜单价格，该价格将根据一天中的不同时段而浮动--类似于优步（Uber）和Lyft等共享出行公司采用的激增定价策略。

item.title: 专家称，尽管枪击事件造成一名旁观者死亡，约二十多人受伤，但被指控在堪萨斯城酋长队超级碗集会上开枪的男子可能有充分理由通过该州的 "站在你的立场上 "法进行自卫。
item.description:
Experts say that even though the shooting left one bystander dead and roughly two dozen injured, the men accused of firing shots at the Kansas City Chiefs Super Bowl rally might have good cases for self-defense through the state’s “stand your ground” law. https://t.co/yYEHi5B9JO

item.title: 在这一天：1922 年，最高法院在 Leser 诉 Garnett 案中一致支持宪法第 19 修正案，该修正案保障了妇女的选举权。
item.description:
ON THIS DAY: In 1922 the Supreme Court, in Leser v. Garnett, unanimously upheld the 19th Amendment to the Constitution, which guaranteed the right of women to vote. https://t.co/1Lfd5NzmKC pic.twitter.com/q8v86t58Zq

— ABC News (@ABC) February 27, 2024

item.title: 何塞-贝兹（Jose Baez）律师在接受 ABC 新闻独家采访时说，圣约翰斯县治安官办公室对他的当事人维尔吉利奥-阿吉拉尔-门德斯（Virgilio Aguilar Mendez）实施了 "非法逮捕"，警方最初接触他的原因是种族貌相。
item.description:
Speaking exclusively with ABC News, Attorney Jose Baez said the St. Johns County Sheriff's Office conducted an "unlawful arrest" of his client, Virgilio Aguilar Mendez, and that racial profiling was the reason he was initially approached by police.https://t.co/QJPAIcIHZ5

— ABC News (@ABC) February 27, 2024

item.title: 莫斯科一家法院周二判处一名公开反对乌克兰战争的资深人权倡导者两年零六个月监禁。他在法庭上被直接羁押。
item.description:

item.title: 一位以色列高级政治人士周二告诉美国广播公司新闻（ABC News），以色列总理本雅明-内塔尼亚胡对美国总统乔-拜登的讲话感到 "惊讶"，拜登说他希望以色列和哈马斯之间的停火协议能 "在下周一之前 "达成。

item.title: 一名男子在攀爬佛罗里达州里弗维尤的一座移动通信塔后被捕。当局称，该男子之前曾在自己的社交媒体上直播攀爬过程。

A man was arrested after climbing a cellular tower in Riverview, Florida. Authorities said the man had previously been live-streaming the climb to his social media. pic.twitter.com/UzDPYEwiOT

— ABC News (@ABC) February 27, 2024

item.title: 对于政治犯来说，俄罗斯刑罚殖民地和劳改营的生活是一个严峻的现实，身心压力、食物不足、医疗条件差、睡眠不足，还有无法遵守的专横规定。
item.description:
For political prisoners, life in Russia’s penal colonies and labor camps is a grim reality of physical and psychological pressure, insufficient food, poor health care, sleep deprivation and arbitrary rules that are impossible to obey. https://t.co/lWZe4oe7Lz

— ABC News (@ABC) February 27, 2024

item.title: 据当局称，一名现役空军士兵周日在华盛顿特区以色列大使馆外自焚身亡。大都会警察局已确认这名男子是来自圣安东尼奥的 25 岁亚伦-布什内尔（Aaron Bushnell）。
item.description:
An active-duty airman has died after authorities say he set himself on fire Sunday outside the Israeli Embassy in Washington, D.C.

The man has been identified by the Metropolitan Police Department as 25-year-old Aaron Bushnell of San Antonio. https://t.co/ysD8m78TZs pic.twitter.com/TMR10KDWuv

— ABC News (@ABC) February 27, 2024
